sen.j: シダレザクラ（枝垂桜）とは、エドヒガンザクラの変種の桜である。
sen.e: Shidarezakura is a specific variety of Edo higan cherry tree.
Shidarezakura is a variety of Edohiganzakura.
sen.cmt: 単語の訳を修正しました用語登録の訳に修正しました
sen.e: Shidarezakura is a variety of Edohiganzakura.
The time of bloom is April.
sen.cmt: 単語の訳を修正しました
sen.e: The time of bloom is April.

sen.j: 学名Cerasus spachiana f. spachiana（シノニムPrunus pendula f. pendula）
sen.e: It is botanically named Cerasus spachiana f. spachiana (Prunus pendula f. pendula).
It is botanically named Cerasus spachiana f. spachiana (Prunus pendula f. pendula).
It is botanically named Cerasus spachiana f. spachiana (Prunus pendula f. pendula).

sen.j: 枝垂桜の特徴は、枝が長くその名の通りにしだれている。
sen.e: Shidarezakura is characterized by its long drooping branches as its name suggests.
Shidarezakura is characterized by its long drooping branches as its name suggests.
Shidarezakura is characterized by its long drooping branches as its name suggests.
